    • Controller

  • Method Details

    • registerProject

      public boolean registerProject(String nameProject, String nameClient, int day, int monthS, int yearS, int dateE, int monthE, int yearE, Double budget, String managerName, String managerPhone)
      Registers a new project with the given parameters.
      Parameters:
      nameProject - the name of the project
      nameClient - the name of the client
      day - the start day of the project
      monthS - the start month of the project
      yearS - the start year of the project
      dateE - the end day of the project
      monthE - the end month of the project
      yearE - the end year of the project
      budget - the budget of the project
      managerName - the name of the project manager
      managerPhone - the phone number of the project manager

    • showProjects

      public String showProjects()
      Returns a string with information about all registered projects.
      Returns:
      a string with information about all registered projects

    • culminateStage

      public boolean culminateStage(int optionP, int diaIR, int mesIR, int yearIR, int diaFR, int mesFR, int yearFR)
      Changes the status of a stage to "completed" and sets its actual start and end dates.
      Parameters:
      optionP - the index of the project in the listOfProject array
      diaIR - the actual start day of the stage
      mesIR - the actual start month of the stage
      yearIR - the actual start year of the stage
      diaFR - The day of the date on which the action is performed.
      mesFR - The month of the date on which the action is performed
      yearFR - The year of the date on which the action is performed.
      Returns:
      True if the stage has been successfully completed, false otherwise.

    • editStage

      public boolean editStage(int stageOption, int dateSP, int monthSP, int yearSP, int cantidadMeses)
      Edits the start and end dates of a stage in a project.
      Parameters:
      stageOption - The index of the project where the stage is located.
      dateSP - The day of the planned start date of the stage.
      monthSP - The month of the planned start date of the stage.
      yearSP - The month of the planned start date of the stage.
      cantidadMeses - The number of months to add to the planned start date to calculate the planned end date
      Returns:
      True if the stage was successfully edited, false otherwise

    • showCurrentStages

      public String showCurrentStages(int stageOption)
      Returns a string with the information of the current stages of a project.
      Parameters:
      stageOption - The index of the project to show the stages of.
      Returns:
      A string with the information of the current stages of the project.

    • registerCapsule

      public boolean registerCapsule(String id, String description, int type, String colabName, String jobTitle, String lessonLearned, int OptionP)
      Registers a new capsule for the active stage of the project with the given ID.
      Parameters:
      id - The capsule ID.
      description - The capsule description.
      type - The capsule type (1 = Technical, 2 = Management, 3 = Domain, 4 = Experiences).
      colabName - The name of the collaborator who created the capsule.
      jobTitle - The job title of the collaborator who created the capsule.
      lessonLearned - The lesson learned from the capsule.
      OptionP - The project ID.
      Returns:
      True if the capsule was registered successfully, false otherwise.

    • approveCapsule

      public boolean approveCapsule(int optionP, int capsuleApr)
      Approves a capsule for a given project and stage.
      Parameters:
      optionP - the index of the project to approve the capsule for
      capsuleApr - the index of the capsule to approve
      Returns:
      true if the capsule is successfully approved, false otherwise

    • publishCapsule

      public boolean publishCapsule(int optionP, int capsuleApr, String URL)
      Publishes a capsule for a given project, stage, and URL.
      Parameters:
      optionP - the index of the project to publish the capsule for
      capsuleApr - the index of the capsule to publish
      URL - the URL to publish the capsule to
      Returns:
      true if the capsule is successfully published, false otherwise

    • showCapsulesSelect

      public String showCapsulesSelect(int optionP, int capsuleApr)
      Returns a string representation of a selected capsule for a given project and stage.
      Parameters:
      optionP - the index of the project to show the capsule for
      capsuleApr - the index of the capsule to show
      Returns:
      a string representation of the selected capsule

    • showCapsules

      public String showCapsules(int optionP)
      Returns a string representation of all capsules for a given project and stage.
      Parameters:
      optionP - the index of the project to show all capsules for
      Returns:
      a string representation of all capsules for the selected project and stage

    • showWord

      public String showWord(String word)
      Searches for a specific word within the descriptions of all capsules in all projects, and returns information about the project, stage, and capsule where the word was found.
      Parameters:
      word - the word to search for in the capsule descriptions
      Returns:
      a String with information about the project, stage, and capsule where the word was found

    • registerTypeCapsules

      public String registerTypeCapsules()
      Registers the number of capsules of each type for all projects and returns a String with this information.
      Returns:
      a String with the quantity of each type of capsule registered for all projects

    • projectCapsules

      public String projectCapsules()
      Method to get the project with the most capsules created.
      Returns:
      a String indicating the name of the project with the most capsules created and the total number of capsules registered

    • searchCapsuleColab

      public String searchCapsuleColab(String colabName)
      Method to search for a capsule registered by a collaborator in any project.
      Parameters:
      colabName - the name of the collaborator to search for
      Returns:
      a String indicating the name of the project, stage number, and capsule position of any capsules registered by the collaborator in any project

    • lessons

      public String lessons(int m)
      Returns a message with the lessons learned from the chosen project
      Parameters:
      m - to choose the project where the lesson is to be learned
      Returns:
      a message with the lessons learned from the chosen project

    • createFecha

      public Calendar createFecha(int dia, int mes, int year)
      Creates a Calendar object with the given day, month, and year.
      Parameters:
      dia - the day of the month (1-31).
      mes - the month (1-12)
      year - the year.
      Returns:
      a Calendar object with the given day, month, and year.
